entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Coola Airport 12:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure: 103.8 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
